Anyone using it can gain access to your key, so it\'s recommended not to show it to anyone or send it anywhere. However, the choice is provided to you. Wallet for H2K cashback This wallet is automatically created and operates on the Polygon blockchain. Coins from the H2K project will be credited to this wallet once a day as cashback for completed transactions. In the future, these coins can be used to pay for services within the H2K ecosystem (e.g., multi-signature wallet commissions). Recipient\'s address Buy RUCash To transfer USDT, the TRX balance must be at least 60, the system will top up TRX for an amount &asymp %.2f USDT, which will be deducted from your USDT account. Otherwise, top up TRX yourself.
